New Records: Hungary and Bosnia & Herzegovina's 0-0 draw gave both sides their maiden Group A3 point
Key Match Events: Nikola Vasilj made four saves before half time
Dominik Szoboszlai's 25-yard dipping free-kick struck the crossbar
Martin Adam planted his free header straight at the legs of Vasilj
Post-Match Reflections: The result gave both sides their maiden Group A3 point
The Bosnians ended a run of seven straight losses
The Magyars stay unbeaten in five meetings against Bosnia
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hungary and Bosnia & Herzegovina played out a goalless draw
The match was played at the Puskas Arena in Budapest
Nikola Vasilj was named Flashscore Man of the Match
Others: Hungary and Bosnia & Herzegovina's next match will be crucial in determining their position in the Group A3 standings
